name: PHD (itch)
description:
PHD - Printer Hate Department

Sometimes the input is not working: Refreshing the site can help, I have no idea why it's happening, sorry!

You play as a random soft developer who gets sent in to a VR world to fix some game breaking bugs. You wield a code gun and are able to fix broken code segments with it!

Controls

Movement: A D, Arrow keys

Jump: Space

Shoot: Shift

We had plans for a story introduction, and also a bigger world with different enemies and bosses. But time ran away from us and at the end we focused on getting a few playable levels that felt fun to play. 

To stay true to the theme, there are of course a few bugs, some we know about, and some we don't. Please let us know if you find any fun ones!

  • The input not working all the time
  • You get the win-screen even if you miss a few of the bugs
  • It's possible to use the environment to make the character float

Coding: Liioni and Daverinoe

Art: Liioni with some additions and ideas by Daverinoe

Sound: Daverinoe

Level design: Liioni
